Project.name: Employee Admin Demo for JavaScript
Project.Description: This demo illustrates techniques for performing routine UI operations in a PureMVC-based JavaScript/MooTools application.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Changes in Version 1.1.1
  • First public release on puremvc.org
  • Form validation improvement and non-absolute design
Changes in Version 1.1
  • Form validation implementation.
Features in Version 1.0
  • irst public release on tekool.net
  • Port of the classic AS3 Employee Admin demo
Project.Installation:
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a EmployeeAdmin_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\EmployeeAdmin_X_Y From the Repository
  • Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
